abstract: In spite of a move to limit future debate participation, Rick Perry is confronting a variety of forces pushing for more. Also, the Obama campaign's relationship with lobbyists.
snippet: In spite of a move to limit future debate participation, Rick Perry is confronting a variety of forces pushing for more. Also, the Obama campaign's relationship with lobbyists.
lead_paragraph: In spite of a move to limit future debate participation, Rick Perry is confronting a variety of forces pushing for more. Also, a look at the Obama campaign's relationship with lobbyists.
